column4: guys how can I take a complete image of ubuntu server without a) affecting anything on the system b) paying for software :D
Need it so if the hdd fails I can just re-image it
boot into live cd find out the name of your harddrive, and do sudo dd if=/dev/sourcehdd of=/dev/target
where source and target are harddrive names ie sda or sdb, target have to be at least the same size as source
